original_title: Bubble Guppies: Bubble Puppy's Awesome Adventures
overview: Along with his best Guppy friends, Bubble Puppy will explore a mysterious ancient temple, get a brand-new dram doghouse, play a totally perfect role in the Wizard of Oz-tralia, make a new fur-ever friend and more!
title: Bubble Guppies: Bubble Puppy's Awesome Adventures
